alert.note: Alert for North Fulton; South Fulton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 09 at 5:54PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern DeKalb and south central Fulton Counties through 630 PM EDT... At 554 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Lakewood Park, or near Atlanta, moving northwest at 5 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Atlanta, Decatur, City of South Fulton, East Point, College Park, Hapeville, Avondale Estates, Belvedere Park, North Decatur, North Druid Hills, Midtown, Grant Park-Zoo Atlanta, Candler-Mcafee, Druid Hills, North Atlanta, Sweet Auburn, Piedmont Park, Cascade Heights, Lakewood Park and East Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
